text: Ingangarir God amizim, a Moses Osirizir Arazibagh amizɨ da otifi. Ezɨ tuavir kamɨn ovevem otos. Dughiar kam God dagɨam abɨghizɨ, osiziriba vaghvagha an otifi, ezɨ Godɨn angazangarim uaghan ize. Egha angazangarir kam Mosesɨn guam gisirazɨ Israelia an guamɨn ganan buraghburaki. Ezɨ gɨn angazangarir kam gɨfa.
